content.rendered:
d’lashes signature extensions

extended wear lashes
lasting up to 6-8 weeks

single individual, high-quality lashes

attached to lash using a gentle,
lasting protein bond

customized for your desired
look, whether that’s ultra
glamorous, supernatural,
or somewhere in between.

appointment takes
approximately 2 hours

d’lashes signature
party flare lashes

lasts 2-3 weeks

sexy flare lashes, 3 for each of
your natural lashes

attached to lash using a gentle,
lasting protein bond

customized for a fuller
look, each look is unique
to the customer with
a glamorous result

appointment takes
approximately 1 hour

d’lashes signature combo
extension & flare lashes

lasts 2-3 weeks

party flare and extension
lashes combined for fullness

attached in between your natural
lashes using a gentle yet flexible bond

customized for a fuller
look that is especially durable
because of the combination
of the two styles.

appointment takes
approximately 1 and a half hours
